Methodology

Type Driven Development

Type-driven development allows us to build apps that last longer and are easier to maintain. We use type theory to model the problem at hand and as it changes over time we know exactly what needs to be changed. Software products built with strong, statically typed languages are easier to add more features to. At Wavi Labs we can focus on adding features while keeping bugs low.



Property-based testing

The future of software construction.

Enter your super app's description here... The key is to find the right length. Don't want it to be too long, but then don't want it to be too short so that it looks weird between the title and button below.



Literate Programming
